duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, schedule, implement & coordinate the construction of quality homes from development through final construction in a timely & economical manner.
Oversee the managerial aspects of construction projects, including selection, coordination, oversight & management of people, materials, budgets, schedules & contracts.
Direct & monitor project progress, ensuring compliance with building/safety codes and maintaining safe, clean, and compliant job sites.
Track & control construction costs against the budget, prepare reports, negotiate pricing, obtain insurance info, and manage subcontractors.
Establish good working relationships with a variety of stakeholders, supervise effectively at all levels, and manage time effectively.
Understand construction practices and regulations, read blueprints, pay attention to detail, and maintain a strong sense of urgency.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Civil Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
